text: Follow Fast Company We Will Come To You 1 minute Read The actor-slash-cofounder of Water.org teamed up with a beer company and a massive art installation to tackle the world’s water crisis. By FastCo Studios Fast Company Daily Newsletter: Get our best stories delivered to your inbox. Sign Up
